thread.section_title: Bake Me A Wish! Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bake Me A Wish! | www.bakemeawish.com | 10 of 186
thread.title: Catherine
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Catherine

author: Catherine
title: Catherine
text:
The UPS person did not deliver my son's birthday cake - he was supposed to leave it if no one was home. By 8pm on the Friday, my son was out celebrating his 21st birthday with his friends. UPS couldn't fix, so only option was redelivery on Monday...:(. Bake Me A Wish wasn't open on the weekend, but promptly upon calling on Monday, they did RUSH a new cake out to my son for a Tuesday delivery.
All turned out well, although the surprise wasn't timely as wished. MAKE SURE YOU HAVE CAKE MARKED 'LEAVE WITHOUT SIGNATURE'
